Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In marked contrast to the ATM mutation pattern in A - T , the most frequent nucleotide changes in this leukaemia were missense mutations .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| A - T mutation in leukaemia |

The paragraph is not describing any specific disease by name, it is only mentioning that there is a contrast in mutation patterns between A - T mutations in leukaemia and the most frequent nucleotide changes which are missense mutations. Therefore, the only valid disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is "A - T mutation in leukaemia".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| A - T mutation in leukaemia |

The paragraph only mentions "A - T mutation in leukaemia" as a disease entity. Other entities such as "ATM mutation pattern", "nucleotide changes", and "missense mutations" do not clearly refer to diseases, but rather describe the type of mutations associated with the disease.
